name: Painting the Bills
description:
Game developed in 8 days for the 2022 Juice Jam!

Description 

Can you survive as a struggling artist in a dingy apartment? Quickly complete commissions to pay your bills and keep your lights on. However, your clients keep changing their minds at the last minute! If all your lights go out, the gig is up.

Controls

  • Left Click -> Paint, Interact
  • Right Click -> Show Painting
  • Escape -> Pause

Credits

All art and code created by Adam Brady

For the audio, a special thanks to:

  • Kevin MacLeod
  • Pixabay
  • ZapSplat

Updates
